attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PETITION ENQUIRY , PROTEST 
TO SPORT, EDUCATION ,CULTURE, HEALTH,  LAW AND  ORDER, WORK AND  WELFARE
 
HERE IS A MONEY MISSED FACT SUPER IMPORTANT? YOU CAN PUT £20 MILLION INTO ANY SCHOOL COLLEGE  THE PUPILS,TEACHERS ARE ONLY  1 HAND  EDUCATED,SUPPORTED,ENQUIRING,*>> MINDS NEXT TO SUNK UNEDUCATED HEMISPHERE TUCK HAND THAT WILL HURT AGAIN AND AGAIN FOR MONTHS BUT THEN  ITS HURT*MOVE> IS STOPPED AND IT LIGHT FLOATS SKILLED AIMED DATA REF/SEC LOOPS
LEFT-HAND IS DEEP ELECTRICALLY SUBCONSCIOUS CONNECTED TO  YOU BRAIN/SECOND
AND THUS  MAKES  EXTRA ELECTRIC  THINK IN YOUR DARK UNUSED HEMISPHERE EYE HAND NERVES REFLEX
 CONTINUED USE INSTALLS AN AUTO GUARD SKILLED IN TOOLS  WEAPONS ETC
WHERE THE  HANDS  LEAD THE LEGS FOLLOW  AND YOU END UP USING A SECOND = POWER-STANCE FOR ALL LEFT SHOTS  EVEN WRITE>>>> IE BODY TWIST>>>

THERE ARE A FEW WEB SITES ON AMBIDEXTERITY GENIUS 3 MIND SET USE 2 THINK

YF BH
